alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Jasper (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 4:56PM CDT until March 12 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Jasper County in east central Mississippi... Central Clarke County in east central Mississippi... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 456 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Barnett, or 9 miles west of Quitman, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Quitman around 505 PM CDT. De Soto around 510 PM CDT. Sykes around 515 PM CDT. Crandall around 520 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Pachuta and Hinton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
